Package org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project.ui.customizer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomizerProvider2 Deprecated
    since 1.51, use org.netbeans.spi.project.ui.CustomizerProvider2 instead
    CustomizerProvider3
    CustomizerProvider enhanced with ability to explicitly close a customizer that may be currently opened.
    EditMediator.ListComponent  
    ProjectSharability
    Ability to verify whether the project is currently sharable, and if not to make it so.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AntArtifactItem
    Pair of AntArtifact and one of jars it produces.
    ClassPathListCellRenderer
    Visual classpath customizer support.
    EditMediator
    Visual classpath customizer support.
    MainClassChooser
    Browses and allows to choose a project's main class.
    MainClassWarning
    Shows a warning that no main class is set and allows choose a main class.
    SourceRootsUi
    Handles adding, removing, reordering of source roots.
    SourceRootsUi.EditMediator
